General.Name: North Navigation Control Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: North Navigation Control Technology Co.,Ltd. provides military and civilian products in China. It offers navigation control and ammunition information technology detection, environmental, and stability control products; radio and satellite communication equipment; electrical connectors; and other products, as well as special vehicles. The company was formerly known as China North Optical-Electrical Tech Co and changed its name to North Navigation Control Technology Co.,Ltd. in April 2012. North Navigation Control Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
